issue.title: Problem with stereotype keyword
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When adding keyword, the metadata fill a blank keyword + keyword with onlineressource tags when creating a new metadata : 

```

<gmd:descriptiveKeywords>
        <gmd:MD_Keywords>
          <gmd:keyword>
            <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco"></gco:CharacterString>
          </gmd:keyword>
        <gmd:keyword>
            <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">accident</gco:CharacterString>
          <gmd:linkage><gmd:URL/></gmd:linkage><gmd:protocol><gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco"/></gmd:protocol><gmd:name><gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco"/></gmd:name><gmd:function><gmd:CI_OnLineFunctionCode codeList="#CI_OnLineFunctionCode" codeListValue=""/></gmd:function></gmd:keyword><gmd:keyword>
            <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco"> source d\'accident</gco:CharacterString>
          <gmd:linkage><gmd:URL/></gmd:linkage><gmd:protocol><gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco"/></gmd:protocol><gmd:name><gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco"/></gmd:name><gmd:function><gmd:CI_OnLineFunctionCode codeList="#CI_OnLineFunctionCode" codeListValue=""/></gmd:function></gmd:keyword></gmd:MD_Keywords>
      </gmd:descriptiveKeywords>
```

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

This bug still remains in the 4.2.0 Beta 5
